casebody.data:
JONES
v.
WELLS FARGO BANK, NA, et al. 430P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Cedric R. Perry, Attorney at Law, Rocky Mount, for Jones, Debra. H. George Kurani, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Veronica Fleury, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Wells Fargo Bank, N.A., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of December 2018 by Defendant for Sanctions:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."
